div.div: Monte Carlo simulation parameter summary results.
div.p:
MC Distribution is the sampling distribution of each parameter used in the Monte Carlo simulation, where
X
( p 1, p 2) represents the probability distribution (
N
for normal,
U
for uniform), and p 1 and p 2 represent the mean and standard deviation of the parameter, respectively. Opt. refers to the subset of optimized Monte Carlo simulations, N.O. to the subset of non-optimized simulations, SD refers to the standard deviation, and KS p-value is the p-value of the 2-sample Kolmogorov-Smirnov test applied to the optimized and non-optimized sets.
